data.name: How to watch Zee5 outside India
data.part1: Zee5 is one of the best new streaming services in India with tons of content you can access for free. If you’re in India that’s great.
data.part2: Unfortunately if you’re outside India you’ll be blocked from accessing. If you visit the Zee5 website outside India then you’ll be blocked with a message that tells you it’s not available in your country.If you’re in the US, UK, Australia or any other country then this can be a real disappointment. But don’t worry! In this guide I’m going to show you the really easy way you can watch Zee5 outside India.

data.name: Step 1: Get yourself a VPN service
data.part1: This is an app you download for your device that lets you change your location. If for example you’re in America the VPN app will make it look like you’re in India.
data.part2: If you search Google for the term ‘VPN’ then you’ll come up with hundreds of options. Not all work with Zee5. My recommended service is ExpressVPN.However, there are a few other choices, if you’ve got time to look around then I recommend the following three providers.

data.name: Step 2: Use the VPN to watch Zee5 outside India
data.part1: Now you’ve signed up for the VPN service you’ll need to download their app and connect to India. This will allow you to watch Zee5 outside India from any country in the world.
data.part2: Follow my step-by-step guide below which shows you where to get the VPN app and how you can use it to watch Zee5 outside India.

data.name: Will this work on my phone or tablet?
data.part1: Yes, this will work fine on a mobile or tablet device.
data.part2: As well as being able to watch on a regular computer or tablet you can use the Zee5 app or visit their website on your phone or tablet and watch.Simply download the ExpressVPN app to your mobile device first and connect to India. You can then watch the Zee5 app or website anywhere in the world.

data.name: How does a VPN work?
data.part1: When you visit the Zee5 website or use their app it first checks what country you’re in.
data.part2: If it sees you’re outside India then it will block you from watching. When you use a VPN from a provider such as ExpressVPN then you’ll appear like you are in India which will unblock Zee5 outside India.When you’re connected to the VPN your request is first sent to India before being sent to the Zee5 website. It is this that fools the Zee5 website into thinking you are in India.

data.name: Recap: How to watch Zee5 outside India
data.part1: If you want to watch Zee5 outside India then it’s a lot easier than you might imagine.
data.part2: You can get ExpressVPN by clicking the button below and signing up for their service. It’s this app that allows you to unblock Zee5 and watch anywhere in the world. You can watch in America, the UK, Australia or any other country. Once you’ve clicked the button below sign up for their service. Then download their app for your type of device. Then connect to India. You’ll now be able to watch Zee5 outside India in any country in the world. Don’t forget ExpressVPN has a massive 30-day money back guarantee so it’s risk-free.
